sources.title: Plymouth Adventure (1952) Spencer Tracy Â· Gene Tierney
sources.description: The film tells the story of the Mayflower, its captain, and the pilgrims on their way to America. ..

metadata.Plot: The story of the voyage of the "Mayflower" in its historic voyage across the Atlantic to the New World. The passenger list includes John Alden and Priscilla Mullins among those who made the 96-day storm-filled crossing. Along the way the Captain has an ill-starred romance with the wife of a religious fanatic that ends in a sudden, dramatic way off the coast of Cape Cod.
metadata.Actors: Spencer Tracy, Gene Tierney, Van Johnson
